model_answer:
The correct sequence is A: 1 -> 3 -> 2 -> 4 -> 5 -> 6. 

First, he delivers a big impulse and then random hits to the heavy bag (Option 1). Then, he strikes the wooden bat, which rings audibly, and then moves toward the whiteboard (Option 2). At the whiteboard, he explains the charge circuit, likening capacitor charging to swinging back a baseball bat (Option 3). Next, he describes the spark gap and big primary coil, saying it’s like hitting it with the bat (Option 4). Afterward, he calls the high-voltage side the electrical equivalent of the heavy bag and talks about pumping an impulse into the secondary while a “DANGER HIGHVOLTAGE” sign is visible (Option 5). Finally, he mentions planning a “dancing goop” mechanical resonance video while pointing to a drawing of the blue punching bag on the board (Option 6).
